00037 #define HUMIDITY_MEASUREMENT_MEASURED_VLAUE_INVALID               0xffff
00038 
00042 #define ZCL_HUMIDITY_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT 5
00043 
00047 #define ZCL_HUMIDITY_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_SERVER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT 0
00048 
00052 #define ZCL_HUMIDITY_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT 1
00053 
00057 #define ZCL_HUMIDITY_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_CLIENT_COMMANDS_AMOUNT 0
00058 
00059 //Attribute Ids of Basic Cluster Information
00060 #define ZCL_HUMIDITY_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_VERSION_ATTRIBUTE_ID                          CCPU_TO_LE16(0xfffd)
00061 
00065 #define ZCL_HUMIDITY_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_SERVER_MEASURED_VALUE_ATTRIBUTE_ID     CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0000)
00066 #define ZCL_HUMIDITY_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_SERVER_MIN_MEASURED_VALUE_ATTRIBUTE_ID CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0001)
00067 #define ZCL_HUMIDITY_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_SERVER_MAX_MEASURED_VALUE_ATTRIBUTE_ID CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0002)
00068 #define ZCL_HUMIDITY_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_SERVER_TOLERANCE_ATTRIBUTE_ID          CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0003)
00069 
00072 #define ZCL_DEFINE_HUMIDITY_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES(reportMin, reportMax) \
00073   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE(clusterVersion, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_HUMIDITY_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_VERSION_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_U16BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID), \
00074   DEFINE_REPORTABLE_ATTRIBUTE_WITH_BOUNDARY(measuredValue, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE | ZCL_CHECK_OTHER_ATTR, ZCL_HUMIDITY_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_SERVER_MEASURED_VALUE_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_U16BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID, reportMin, reportMax, \
00075                                            ZCL_HUMIDITY_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_SERVER_MIN_MEASURED_VALUE_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_HUMIDITY_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_SERVER_MAX_MEASURED_VALUE_ATTRIBUTE_ID), \
00076   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE_WITH_BOUNDARY(minMeasuredValue, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_HUMIDITY_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_SERVER_MIN_MEASURED_VALUE_ATTRIBUTE_ID,  ZCL_U16BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID, 0x0000, 0x270F), \
00077   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE_WITH_BOUNDARY(maxMeasuredValue, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_HUMIDITY_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_SERVER_MAX_MEASURED_VALUE_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_U16BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID, 0x0001, 0x2710),\
00078   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE_WITH_BOUNDARY(tolerance, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_HUMIDITY_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_SERVER_TOLERANCE_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_U16BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID, 0x0000, 0x0800)
00079 
00080 #define ZCL_DEFINE_HUMIDITY_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES() \
00081   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE(clusterVersion, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_HUMIDITY_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_VERSION_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_U16BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID) 
00082     
00083 #define HUMIDITY_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes) \
00084   { \
00085     .id = HUMIDITY_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_ID, \
00086     .options = {.type = ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY}, \
00087     .attributesAmount = ZCL_HUMIDITY_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00088     .attributes = (uint8_t *) (clattributes), \
00089     .commandsAmount = ZCL_HUMIDITY_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_SERVER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00090     .commands = NULL \
00091   }
00092 
00093 #define HUMIDITY_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes) \
00094   { \
00095     .id = HUMIDITY_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_ID, \
00096     .options = {.type = ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY}, \
00097     .attributesAmount = ZCL_HUMIDITY_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00098     .attributes = (uint8_t *) (clattributes), \
00099     .commandsAmount = ZCL_HUMIDITY_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_CLIENT_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00100     .commands = NULL \
00101   }
00102 
00103 #define DEFINE_HUMIDITY_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER(cltype, clattributes) \
00104     HUMIDITY_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_##cltype(clattributes)

00113 typedef struct PACK {
00114   struct PACK {
00115     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00116     uint8_t type;
00117     uint8_t properties;
00118     uint16_t value;
00119     ZCL_ReportTime_t  reportCounter;     
00120     ZCL_ReportTime_t  minReportInterval; 
00121     ZCL_ReportTime_t  maxReportInterval; 
00122     uint16_t          reportableChange;  
00123     ZCL_ReportTime_t  timeoutPeriod;     
00124     uint16_t          lastReportedValue; 
00125     ZCL_AttributeId_t minVal;            
00126     ZCL_AttributeId_t maxVal;            
00127   } measuredValue ;
00128 
00129   struct PACK {
00130     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00131     uint8_t type;
00132     uint8_t properties;
00133     uint16_t value;
00134     uint16_t minVal;
00135     uint16_t maxVal;
00136   } minMeasuredValue ;
00137 
00138   struct PACK {
00139     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;
00140     uint8_t type;
00141     uint8_t properties;
00142     uint16_t value;
00143     uint16_t minVal;
00144     uint16_t maxVal;
00145   } maxMeasuredValue ;
00146 
00147   struct PACK {
00148     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00149     uint8_t type;
00150     uint8_t properties;
00151     uint16_t value;
00152     uint16_t minVal;
00153     uint16_t maxVal;
00154   } tolerance ;
00155   
00156   struct PACK
00157   {
00158     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00159     uint8_t type;
00160     uint8_t properties;
00161     uint16_t value;
00162   } clusterVersion;
00163 
00164 } ZCL_HumidityMeasurementClusterServerAttributes_t ;
00165 
00166 typedef struct PACK
00167 {
00168   struct PACK
00169   {
00170     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00171     uint8_t type;
00172     uint8_t properties;
00173     uint16_t value;
00174   } clusterVersion;
00175 
00176 } ZCL_HumidityMeasurementClusterClientAttributes_t;
